abstract: Despite a declaration by UBS‘ chairman that the Swiss bank is done raising capital, the firm may post an additional $6.9 billion in write-downs and need to seek more funds, a Citigroup analyst wrote on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Despite a declaration by UBS‘ chairman that the Swiss bank is done raising capital, the firm may post an additional $6.9 billion in write-downs and need to seek more funds, a Citigroup analyst wrote on Thursday.

headline.main: UBS May Need More Funds, Analyst Says
